titleStmt.title: News from Chester giving an account of the present posture of affairs at Dublin, by a person lately arrived from thence. With an account what forces are embarqued for Ireland. Licensed, August 7. 1689.
titleStmt.author: J. P.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Wilson, at Charing-Cross,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
